extendedInfo.description: Enjoy the convenience, security and ease of doing your banking right from your mobile device. You can check your account balances, transfer funds, view recent activity, receive alerts, find ATMs or banking centers - even make check deposits from your phone.To get started, download and launch the app. Then sign on with your Academy Bank Colorado Online Banking Access ID and Password. Itâs that simple.Monitor Your Account - See account balances and transaction historyPerform Transactions- Pay bills- Transfer money between Academy Bank Colorado accounts- Place a stop paymentMake Check Deposits- Make check deposits with your phone Find Branch Locations and ATMs- Find the nearest Academy Bank Colorado banking center locations & ATMs- Speak with a bank representativeAlerts- Balance level alerts:  let you know when you have gone above or dipped below your pre-selected amount. - Transaction alerts:  let you know when specific transaction activity occurs on your account. - Scheduled alerts:  send you the latest information on your available balance and recent account history.Safe and SecureAcademy Bank Colorado is committed to your security and protecting the privacy of your financial information. We use state of the art technology to protect unauthorized access to your account, your wireless communication is securely encrypted, and your personal information is not stored on your phone. Have Questions?  Call 1-877-712-2265 Academy Bank â Member FDIC

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: This app works great. Will give 5 stars if it stops closing every time I\'m using it and I get a text message thru handcent sms.   Mytouch Q
reviews.author: Steven Martinez

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Works great! Love being able to manage all account right at my finger tips!
reviews.author: Sara Jane

reviews.title: Decent app
reviews.comment: Needs some fine tuning, and I don\'t need a pop-up telling me I\'m not using the stock keyboard every time I open the app. Please remove this \"feature\", and the \'find atm/branch\' function never works either.
reviews.author: Kevin Weller

reviews.title: Like app hate mobile check cashing
reviews.comment: Love the app but the check cashing on it doesn\'t work. It is extremely blurry and frustrating.
reviews.author: Wyatt Murray

reviews.title: Automatic logoff is frustrating.
reviews.comment: This app loses one or two points with its inability to multi-task while using it. I like to reconcile between this app and my checkbook app. I can do this with my other bank app but not this one. When you switch to another app and then switch back to this one you have to log in again every time. Frustrating and inconvenient.
reviews.author: Travis B

reviews.title: Automatic sign off
reviews.comment: I find it very annoying that when I switch between apps such as goin to my checkbook app I am automatically signed out and have to resign in. If that one problem could be fixed this would be a 5 star app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: For the most part, easy to use and efficient app. Tried to use the new deposit feature but it would shut down the app when it got to point where you\'d take a photo of the check. :/
reviews.author: Cat F

reviews.title: Finally!
reviews.comment: I love having this app because I can finally take care of banking issues right on my phone however it would be great to have a widget that tells me how much is in my account that way I don\'t have to log in every single time, I have the mint app that\'s connected to it but for some reason it stopped working
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A+ frm me
reviews.comment: Fast n Easy!
reviews.author: PAULETTE KUHN

reviews.title: How do you deposit checks?
reviews.comment: Great app, only gave it a 3 star because I have no idea how to mobile deposit the checks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Happy!
reviews.comment: This is a great time saver. Thanks, Academy!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work with Samsung Galaxy S4.
reviews.comment: Was working great until I switched from a Droid phone to a Samsung galaxy s4. Now I get the wrong keyboard with no decimal point. Bummer...
reviews.author: Carlos Solis

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Love this app, can deposit checks in just a few hours by taking a picture of it! Awesome!
reviews.author: Stacey Behrens

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Great convenience especially since I\'m in another state than my bank but the decimal point doesn\'t work when trying to add amount when depositing a check. Flustered about that!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love it!!!!!
reviews.comment: Makes my life a lot simpler. I can easily transfer from my business to my personal accounts. Right on!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: System unavailable unable to log in
reviews.comment: This app is not very good. Unable to log in most times or it claims that your password is wrong. Unable to tell what a item is for. This bank really sucks.
reviews.author: Jody Helmig

reviews.title: Lms1975
reviews.comment: Completely happy that Academy finally got a app works well and you can deposit your checks on the phone now
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love
reviews.comment: It is wonderful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Seriously!!!!
reviews.comment: Will not open! Shows main title page then shuts down, re-downloaded it 3 times restarted phone still didn\'t work!
reviews.author: Nicole Holloway

reviews.title: Finally
reviews.comment: So happy you guys have an app now. Makes it sooooo much easier to check balance now
reviews.author: A Google User
